description:
Makoto`s first contract in the other world is with Tomoe, who becomes his attendant. She is entitled to receive a human form as a result of the agreement, but her real identity is Shen, a supreme dragon with the power to control fogs and illusions. She possesses the ability to create Akuu, the other world, and enjoys historical dramas and other things Japanese.
Source: Nippon TV
name: Tomoe
